params.text: Kenha ki podi djudan?
N kre le un livru.
N ka ten un livru.
N dizenha, i Papa djuda pinta fotu.
N pinta fotu, i Mama djuda korta fotu.
N korta fotu, i vovo djuda kola fotu.
N kola fotu, i avo djuda skrevi storia.
N skrevi storia, i irmon djuda organiza pajinas.
N ten un livru gosi. Nu Le livru!

“Kenha ki podi djudan?” credits

This work, “Kenha ki podi djudan?” is a derivative of “Who can help me?” by All Children Reading Cambodia. © The Asia Foundation , 2019 and used under CC BY.

“Kenha ki podi djudan?” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

 

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
